title: Introduction to Next.js
subject: Next.js
learning_objectives: Know the benefits of using Next.js
theory: Next.js is a React framework for building full-stack web applications. It creates fast, SEO-friendly applications by automating configuration and providing features like server-side rendering (SSR) and static site generation (SSG) out of the box.

examples.output: Hello, Next.js! (Rendered on Server or Client)
examples.explanation: Looks exactly like React, but runs with Next.js powers.

common_mistakes.correction: Next.js is built ON TOP of React.

interview_questions.question: What is Next.js?
interview_questions.answer: A React framework for production-grade applications with SSR/SSG support.

summary: The standard framework for React development.
